name: brawlPavilionObjects
description:
Modified Pavilion Town objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps.
Ziggurat: defended by 3-5x 1 Sphinx, reward: 1500-2500 Gold, 4-8 Crystals and Gems, 2-4 Spells from different Schools
The Snake Temple Creature Bank is left as it is. It's power is actually okay as a rare slightly (but not too much!) bigger non-rechargable bank.
All creatures that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
All banks recharge after 4 full days pass.
They are not designed to be taken with your whole army but with parts of your army in multiple places at once.
author: Warzyw647

chinese.name: Brawl模板沙堡城镇小物件
chinese.description:
专为Brawl模板定制的改良版沙堡城镇物件，适用于小型地图。
人面狮神庙：由3-5只人面狮守护，奖励为1500-2500金币、4-8块水晶和宝石、以及来自不同派系的2-4个魔法。蛇神庙则保持不变，它作为罕见的、稍大（但不过于庞大！）的非可刷新宝屋，其实力恰到好处。
所有可升级的生物，无论是守卫还是奖励生物，都可能出现升级后的生物。
所有宝屋每4天刷新一次。
